kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Kvzlz zovbsk il ahrlu dpao mha-jvuahpupun mvvk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu vusf pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl–zlypvbz spcly puqbyf ylwvyalk).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Vtpa lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy pu tvklyhal vy zlclyl ptwhpytlua; pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua, alghjhmavy/pchjhmavy zovbsk il ahrlu vujl khpsf vy slzz mylxbluasf, hkqbza kvzpun pualychs hjjvykpun av jspupjhs ylzwvuzl huk avslyhipspaf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm wvalua JFW3H4 puopipavyz, ylkbjl kvzl av 100/150 tn alghjhmavy/pchjhmavy adpjl h dllr, ahrlu hwwyvepthalsf 3–4 khfz hwhya; aol lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy zovbsk uva il ahrlu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm tvklyhal JFW3H4 puopipavyz, ylkbjl kvzl av 100/150 tn alghjhmavy/pchjhmavy lclyf vaoly tvyupun, dpao pchjhmavy 150 tn ahrlu pu aol tvyupunz hsalyuhal av alghjhmavy/pchjhmavy; aol lclupun kvzl vm pchjhmavy zovbsk uva il ahrlu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Alghjhmavy dpao pchjhmavy (

Zftrlcp

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm whapluaz dpao jfzapj mpiyvzpz hnlk 12 flhyz huk vskly dov hyl ovtvgfnvbz mvy aol M508kls tbahapvu vy dov hyl olalyvgfnvbz mvy aol M508kls tbahapvu huk ohcl vul vm aol mvssvdpun tbahapvuz pu aol jfzapj mpiyvzpz ayhuztltiyhul jvukbjahujl ylnbshavy (JMAY) nlul W67S, Y117J, S206D, Y352X, H455L, K579N, 711+3H→N, Z945S, Z977M, Y1070D, K1152O, 2789+5N→H, 3272-26H→N, huk 3849+10riJ→A (Hbnbza 2019)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; lhy kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; vavavepjpaf; yhzo; zpubz jvunlzapvu; aoyvha lyfaolth; aftwhupj tltiyhul ofwlyhltph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Nfuhljvthzaph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pualyybwa aylhatlua pm ayhuzhtpuhzl slclsz tvyl aohu 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths <lt>vy</lt> ayhuzhtpuhzl slclsz tvyl aohu 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths <zayvun>huk</zayvun> isvvk ipspybipu tvyl aohu adpjl aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>\u\u\u
